    regExpEscape @text

  • ¶

    text.toString()

  • ¶

    returns a unique id that can be compared to other parts

      toString: ->
    "text-#{@text}"

regExpEscape = do ->
  specials = [ '/', '.', '*', '+', '?', '|', '(', ')', '[', ']', '{', '}', '\\' ]
  sRE = new RegExp "(\\#{ specials.join '|\\' })", 'g'
  ( text )-> text.replace sRE, '\\$1'
